accord.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a situation in which two people, ideas, or statements agree with each other
accord.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: It is important to the success of any firm that its partners should be in complete accord.
These results are in accord with earlier research.
accord.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a formal agreement between countries or groups
accord.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: the Helsinki accord on human rights
accord.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to give someone or something special attention or a particular type of treatment
accord.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: You will not be accorded any special treatment.
Every school accords high priority to the quality of teaching.
